at the beginning of your upkeep you may exile all cards from your hand face down if you do put all other cards you own exiled with cardname into your hand
at the beginning of your upkeep look at the top two cards of your library put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order
at the beginning of your upkeep you may have two target players exchange life totals

at the beginning of your upkeep look at the top two cards of your library you may sacrifice cardname and pay genericmana specialmana specialmana if you do put one of those cards into your hand if you don't put one of those cards on the bottom of your library
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card if you control a creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield otherwise put a plus n plus n counter on a creature you control

at the beginning of your upkeep any number of target players each mill two cards if you're the monarch each of those players mills ten cards instead to mill a card a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard
at the beginning of your upkeep choose one
at the beginning of your upkeep if you have no cards in hand sacrifice cardname and target opponent discards their hand
